description: Transform lasagne into bite-sized snacks that will be a hit at your next party. These morsels feature familiar flavours such as fragrant basil and smooth ricotta.
keywords: Lasagne,Seafood free,Tree nut free,Jun 2021,Winter,Low sugar,Sesame free,Beef,Soy free,Mince,Autumn,Peanut free
name: Lasagne Bites Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Woolworths extra virgin olive oil
500g jar Macro Organic tomato, garlic & basil chunky pasta sauce
0.5 cup basil leaves, plus extra small leaves (to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a medium frying pan over high heat. Cook mince, breaking up lumps with a wooden spoon, for 7 minutes or until browned. Add sauce and season, then bring to the boil. Reduce to medium heat and simmer, uncovered, for 5 minutes or until sauce has thickened. Remove pan from heat. Stir in basil.
Meanwhile, grease a 24-hole mini muffin pan. Press 1 wrapper into each hole to form a case.

Divide mince mixture among holes. Top with 1 tsp ricotta, scatter over pizza cheese and spray with oil. Bake for 20 minutes or until wontons are golden and crisp. Stand in pan for 5 minutes, then serve topped with extra basil leaves.
